paper_abstract: The focus of this work is a novel application of configurational forces to tendon layout optimisation problems in prestressed concrete beams. To this end, the application of the method of the configurational forces is extended to two-dimensional plane stress analysis. The optimum tendon position is obtained by iteratively arriving at vanishing configurational forces. The performance of the optimisation algorithm is illustrated by means of numerical examples. (C) 2011 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Tendon layout optimisation through configurational forces equilibration in plane stress analysis of prestressed concrete structures
